description: React component for a chat interface that manages conversations and messages, including loading, real-time updates via Supabase subscriptions, and message sending.

methods.name: loadConversations
methods.description: Fetches conversation list associated with the current organization from the API and sets the state.

methods.name: loadMessages
methods.description: Loads messages for a specified conversation ID.

methods.name: subscribeToMessages
methods.description: Sets up a real-time subscription to message insertions for a conversation using Supabase channels.

methods.name: createConversation
methods.description: Creates a new conversation with a user-input title, updates the conversation list, and selects the new conversation.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Handles sending a new message in the current conversation.
